bug.title: Don't work buttom "try now"
bug.Steps: <1>Navigate to Capital.com</1> <2>Select any Language</2> <3>In Header select block "Products and services"</3> <4>Select block "Our mobile Apps"</4> <5>Scroll down to the buttom "Try now" and click on it</5> <6>Expected Result</6> <7>Actual Result</7> <8>Link</8> <9>Telegram @nick</9>
